00052 template < typename T >
00053 void createStringMatrix( vector< vector< MC2String > >& stringsMatrix,
00054                          const T& desc,
00055                          const MC2String& nspace ) {
00056    MC2String realNamespace = nspace + ":";
00057    for ( uint32 i = 0; i < desc.size(); ++i ) {
00058       vector<MC2String> strings;
00059       StringUtility::splitToVector( desc[ i ].m_name, '/', strings );
00060       if ( ! nspace.empty() ) {
00061          // prefix namespace
00062          for ( uint32 nspaceIdx = 0;
00063                nspaceIdx < strings.size(); ++nspaceIdx ) {
00064             // modify string if its not empty and not an
00065             // attribute
00066             if ( ! strings[ nspaceIdx ].empty() &&
00067                  strings[ nspaceIdx ][ 0 ] != '@' ) {
00068                strings[ nspaceIdx ].insert( 0, realNamespace );
00069             }
00070          }
00071       }
00072 
00073       stringsMatrix.push_back( strings );
00074    }
00075 
00076 }
00077 
00078 } // Impl
00079 
00085 template < typename EvaluatorMap, typename Desc >
00086 void createNodeTree( NameNode& rootNode,
00087                      EvaluatorMap& functions,
00088                      const Desc& desc,
00089                      const MC2String& nspace ) {
00090 
00091    // create a matrix of tokenized strings
00092    vector< vector< MC2String > > stringsMatrix;
00093    Impl::createStringMatrix( stringsMatrix, desc, nspace );
00094 
00095 
00096    // now stringMatrix should have desc.size() number of columns
00097 
00098    NodeList nodes;
00099 
00100    //
00101    // For each matrix, find a matching tree node
00102    //   if no tree node is found
00103    //      create a new node and fill it with matrix row values
00104    //   else
00105    //      insert new nodes at specific depth with the matrix row values
00106    //
00107    //   map leaf node of the newly inserted branch to the functor
00108    //
00109    for ( uint32 i = 0; i < stringsMatrix.size(); ++i ) {
00110       // we are not interested in empty strings
00111       if ( stringsMatrix[ i ].empty() ) {
00112          delete desc[ i ].m_evaluator;
00113          continue;
00114       }
00115       NameNode* leaf = NULL;
00116 
00117 
00118       // find depth
00119       pair<NameNode*, uint32> nodeAndDepth =
00120          Impl::findDepth( nodes, stringsMatrix[ i ] );
00121 
00122       // depth found?
00123       if ( nodeAndDepth.first == NULL ) {
00124          // no node found, create a new tree and attach it
00125          NameNode* newTree = new NameNode( stringsMatrix[ i ][ 0 ] );
00126          nodes.push_back( newTree );
00127          leaf = Impl::fillNode( newTree, stringsMatrix[ i ] );
00128 
00129       } else {
00130          // found a (sub)tree, attach values
00131          leaf = Impl::
00132             fillNode( nodeAndDepth.first,
00133                       vector<MC2String>( stringsMatrix[ i ].begin() +
00134                                          nodeAndDepth.second - 1,
00135                                          stringsMatrix[ i ].end() ) );
00136       }
00137 
00138       // in cases of duplicated sequences like:
00139       //  /a/b/c
00140       //  /a/b/c
00141       // the function map will leak memory unless we search it
00142       // and destroy the duplicate
00143       if ( functions.find( leaf ) != functions.end() ) {
00144          delete functions[ leaf ];
00145       }
00146 
00147       // map leaf to functor
00148       functions[ leaf ] = desc[ i ].m_evaluator;
00149    }
00150    // copy all root nodes to the final root node
00151    rootNode.copyList( nodes );
00152    // For debug:
00153    //   printNode( mc2dbg, rootNode );
00154 
00155 }
00156 
00157 } // Path

00159 #endif // PATH_PATH_H
